channel.title: [pi] Help with a couple of commands plz? [pi]
channel.description:
Hello, i'm kinda new to pi coding... i just have a few quick questions.
I need the following commands please:
::torvaset ::vengrunes ::barragerunes
please help, thanks!
if it helps, i'm using the Hybrid PvP source.

item.title: [pi] Help with a couple of commands plz? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

            if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("torvaset")) {                               
                            c.getItems().addItem(20135, 1);                        
                            c.getItems().addItem(20139, 1);
                            c.getItems().addItem(20143, 1);

Just do the same thing for ::vengrunes and ::barragerunes but change the item ID’s.

Maybe rep?

-Dwarf

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] Help with a couple of commands plz? [pi]
